Description: Production-ready secure, scalable, and highly available web application infrastructure

EnvironmentName.Description: Environment name that will be prefixed to resources
EnvironmentName.ConstraintDescription: Must be Development, Staging, or Production

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Optional suffix to append to resource names for uniqueness
EnvironmentSuffix.ConstraintDescription: Must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens

MinSize.Description: Minimum number of EC2 instances in Auto Scaling Group

MaxSize.Description: Maximum number of EC2 instances in Auto Scaling Group

DesiredCapacity.Description: Desired number of EC2 instances in Auto Scaling Group

ScaleUpThreshold.Description: CPU utilization threshold for scaling up

ScaleDownThreshold.Description: CPU utilization threshold for scaling down

CertificateArn.Description: ARN of the SSL/TLS certificate from AWS Certificate Manager (leave empty to use HTTP only)

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer

Statement.Sid: Allow EC2 service to use the key for EBS encryption
Allow Auto Scaling to use the key for EBS encryption

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alarm when CPU is below threshold
Alarm when target response time is too high
Alarm when unhealthy host count is too high

LoadBalancerURL.Description: URL of the Application Load Balancer

LoadBalancerDNS.Description: DNS name of the Application Load Balancer

LoadBalancerHostedZoneID.Description: Hosted Zone ID of the Application Load Balancer

LoggingBucketName.Description: Name of the S3 logging bucket

AutoScalingGroupName.Description: Name of the Auto Scaling Group

WebServerSecurityGroupId.Description: Security Group ID for Web Servers

ALBSecurityGroupId.Description: Security Group ID for Application Load Balancer
